# LICMEpigenetics

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Provides easy to use, objective oriented functions for preprocessing methylation data produced by an Illumina Infinium BeadChip and detecting differentially methylated positions and regions within the DNA.

## Installation

You can install the released version of LICMEpigenetics from [Github](https://github.com/GregoireCoppens/LICMEpigenetics) with:

``` r
library(devtools)
install_github(GregoireCoppens/LICMEpigenetics)
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(LICMEpigenetics)
## basic example code
```
